story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_04:
She’s right. There is no reason for you to
protect Dialga.
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_05: No way! I’m not like you!
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_06:
I’ll keep battling to the very end if it’s to help
a Pokémon!
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_08:
Lucas’s sync stone is reacting to his feelings of
wanting to save Dialga?
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_09:
Seriously? Lucas is gonna be partners with a
Legendary Pokémon?!
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_10: You...you want to lend us your power, don’t you.
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_11: Got it! Then let’s do this, Dialga!
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_12:
So, Dialga...
You’ve chosen human spirit, have you?
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_13: Fine. You can have that Pokémon.
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_14: That saves me the trouble of disposing of it.
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_16:
Soon enough, you won’t have to feel that
anger anymore.
story_teamgalactic_01_15000/2401_1201_19: C’est une catastrophe! Could you come with me?!
